title: Roll for lane in chat
body:
When two of three people start arguing over a lane, why not just have a button or a /command to roll for it?

MrMuddyPants rolls a 6
NotSoTricky rolls a 1
NoobSauce rolls a 4

Instead of the race to type. each /rolls in chat. It doesn't have to force anything but at least it gives people a method.

replies.body: There should be something that enforces the roll by recording who won the right to go where.  Then if the roll loser trolls, the game can tell where they cs'd the most and if the rest of the team reports them for trolling it serves as proof to BAN THEIR FUCKING SHITBIRD ASS!
Make sure it's a twenty sided die. Those are the best.

Good idea, but people would still go by call order or insist on going that lane if they're trolling.

The worst part is when someone gets in the lobby before you do, so they already have your role called. Glad I have team builder.
